TestGroupDocumentation.Title: totalDigits3 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the totalDigits-3.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a int restricted SimpleType with totalDigits value 5. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int totalDigits-3.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-3-1.xml,...,totalDigits-3-5.xml documents which specify the values 5, 83, 768, 1787, 67720 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-totalDigits-3 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue, elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int totalDigits-3.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-totalDigits-3 type with the values 5, 83, 768, 1787, 67720 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
